verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Had Finished <S%G5055><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> These, <S%G5128><s%> He Withdrew <S%G3332><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Borders <S%G3725><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea <S%G2449><s%> Beyond <S%G4008><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jordan : <S%G2446><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Healed <S%G2323><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> There. <S%G1563><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Tempting <S%G3985><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Him, <S%G1487><s%> Is It Lawful <S%G1832><s%> For A Man <S%G444><s%> To Put Away <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife <S%G846><s%> For <S%G2596><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Cause? <S%G156><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> , To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Ye Not Read <S%G314><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Made Them <S%G4160><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Male <S%G730><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Female <S%G2338><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> Shall Leave <S%G2641><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be Joined <S%G4347><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> To His Wife, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> <S%G1520><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> Are They <S%G1526><s%> Two, <S%G1417><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> <S%G1520><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> United Together, <S%G4801><s%> <S%G444><s%> Man <S%G3361><s%> Let Not Separate. <S%G5563><s%>

They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Did Command <S%G1781><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> A Bill <S%G975><s%> Of Divorce, <S%G647><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Put Away <S%G630><s%> Her? <S%G846><s%>

He Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Them, <S%G3754><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> In View Of <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4641><s%> Your Hard Heartedness <S%G5216><s%> Allowed <S%G2010><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> To Put Away <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> Your Wives; <S%G5216><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> However <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Was Not <S%G1096><s%> Thus. <S%G3779><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> And I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Put Away <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> Fornication, <S%G4202><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Marry <S%G1060><s%> Another, <S%G243><s%> Commits Adultery; <S%G3429><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Her That Is Put Away <S%G630><s%> Marries <S%G1060><s%> Commits Adultery. <S%G3429><s%>

Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> , His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Case <S%G156><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Wife, <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not Profitable <S%G4851><s%> To Marry. <S%G1060><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Receive <S%G5562><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> This Word, <S%G5126><s%> ' But Those <S%G235><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> It Has Been Given; <S%G1325><s%>

<S%G1526><s%> For There Are <S%G1063><s%> Eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Womb <S%G2836><s%> Of Their Mother <S%G3384><s%> Were Born <S%G1080><s%> Thus, <S%G3779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Were Made Eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Eunuchs <S%G2135><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Made Eunuchs Of <S%G2134><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> For The Sake <S%G1223><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Receive It <S%G5562><s%> Let Him Receive It. <S%G5562><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Were Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Little Children, <S%G3813><s%> That His <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> He Might Lay <S%G2007><s%> On Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Might Pray; <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Suffer <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Children, <S%G3813><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Do Forbid <S%G2967><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Me; <S%G1063><s%> For Of Such <S%G5108><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Laid <S%G2007><s%> Upon Them His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> He Departed <S%G4198><s%> Thence. <S%G1564><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%> , Good, <S%G18><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Good Thing <S%G18><s%> Shall I Do <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May Have <S%G2192><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal? <S%G166><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Callest Thou <S%G3004><s%> Good? <S%G18><s%> No One Is <S%G3762><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> One, <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> . <S%G2316><s%> God. <S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Thou Desirest <S%G2309><s%> To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life, <S%G2222><s%> Keep <S%G5083><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Commandments. <S%G1785><s%>

He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Which? <S%G4169><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Said, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Commit Murder; <S%G5407><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Commit Adultery; <S%G3431><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Steal; <S%G2813><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Bear False Witness; <S%G5576><s%>

Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Mother; <S%G3384><s%> , And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4139><s%> Thy Neighbour <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thyself. <S%G4572><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Young Man, <S%G3495><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> Have I Kept <S%G5442><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3503><s%> My Youth, <S%G3450><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Lack I? <S%G5302><s%>

Said <S%G5346><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Desirest <S%G2309><s%> Perfect <S%G5046><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> Sell <S%G4453><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Property <S%G5224><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To The Poor, <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Shalt Have <S%G2192><s%> Treasure <S%G2344><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven; <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Come <S%G1204><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G191><s%> But Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Young Man <S%G3495><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Went Away <S%G565><s%> <S%G3076><s%> <S%G2258><s%> Grieved, <S%G1063><s%> For He Had <S%G2192><s%> Possessions <S%G2933><s%> Many. <S%G4183><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> With Difficulty <S%G1423><s%> A Rich Man <S%G4145><s%> Shall Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G3825><s%> And Again <S%G1161><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Easier <S%G2123><s%> Is It <S%G2076><s%> A Camel <S%G2574><s%> Through The <S%G1223><s%> Eye <S%G5169><s%> Of A Needle <S%G4476><s%> To Pass, <S%G1330><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> A Rich Man <S%G4145><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> To Enter. <S%G1525><s%>

Having Heard <S%G191><s%> And This <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Were Astonished <S%G1605><s%> Exceedingly, <S%G4970><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G687><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> ; To Be Saved? <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G1689><s%> But Looking On Them <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> With <S%G3844><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Impossible <S%G102><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3844><s%> But With <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Possible <S%G1415><s%> Are. <S%G2076><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Left <S%G863><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Thee; <S%G4671><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G687><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> ; To Us? <S%G2254><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Followed <S%G190><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Regeneration, <S%G3824><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Shall Sit Down <S%G2523><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Upon The <S%G1909><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Of His Glory, <S%G846><s%> Shall Sit <S%G2523><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thrones, <S%G2362><s%> Judging <S%G2919><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Tribes <S%G5443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Every One <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Has Left <S%G863><s%> Houses, <S%G3614><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Brothers, <S%G80><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Sisters, <S%G79><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Wife, <S%G1135><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Lands, <S%G68><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1752><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> A Hundredfold <S%G1542><s%> Shall Receive, <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> Shall Inherit; <S%G2816><s%>
<S%G4183><s%> But Many <S%G1161><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Last, <S%G2078><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> First. <S%G4413><s%>
